Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
I'm Ben and need to know when my ride is getting here. It's been so long.
ride id
Could you provide your booking ID, please?
It's 118. They need to hurry, I have a sprained ankle and I'm ready to rest it.
your name
May I have your name, please?
Yes, Ben.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]

Item.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: 2 minutes away

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: 2 minutes away
Great. I know they say ice swelling, but I find heat feels better.

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: anything else

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
Yes, well this driver needs me to give him directions! We are leaving the University and heading to the airport. Can you give me the directions?
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics. [instruction 3 of 6]

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.
Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: travel mode

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
Well, he's driving the car.....
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.) [instruction 4 of 6]

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: departure location

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: departure location
It's the University to the Airport.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given. [instruction 5 of 6]

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: departure time

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Events.Text: When are you going to start your trip?
Now, so 8 pm. Also, I need to schedule a meeting for Tuesday at 1.

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

Drive for 3 blocks and turn left just after you pass a park.
Your destination will be on the left opposite a bar.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately John is not able to make Tuesday @ 1 pm.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
Yes, just when he's available, as usua.

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Ben

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 118)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'University' to 'Airport') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Pittsburgh or New York City)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
